# GitHub Repository Settings

Copy these settings to your GitHub repository to make the deployment model crystal clear.

## Repository Description

**Short Description** (160 characters max):
```

Deploy your own private instance to Vercel in 2 minutes - zero cost, no backend needed.
```

## Repository Homepage URL

Set to your demo/documentation site (or leave as deployment guide):
```
https://github.com/Grandillionaire/SelfStarterSuite/blob/main/DEPLOYMENT.md
```

## README Badges

Add these badges to the top of your README for clarity:

```markdown
[![Deploy with Vercel](https://vercel.com/button)](https://vercel.com/new/clone?repository-url=https://github.com/Grandillionaire/SelfStarterSuite)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
[![Self-Hosted](https://img.shields.io/badge/Deployment-Self--Hosted-blue)](./DEPLOYMENT.md)
[![Bring Your Own Keys](https://img.shields.io/badge/API_Keys-BYOK-green)](https://console.anthropic.com)
```

## How to Apply These Settings

### 1. Repository Description
1. Go to your GitHub repo
2. Click âš™ï¸ (Settings icon) next to "About"
3. Paste description above
4. Add topics
5. Save

### 2. Social Preview
1. Go to Settings â†’ General
2. Scroll to "Social preview"
3. Upload custom image (1200x630)

### 3. Add Badges
1. Edit README.md
2. Add badge markdown at the top
3. Commit changes

## GitHub Issue/PR Templates

Consider adding these to make contributions clearer about the architecture:

**Issue Template** (`.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md`):
```markdown
---
name: Bug Report
about: Report a bug in your deployed instance
---

## Deployment Information
- [ ] I have deployed my own instance to Vercel
- [ ] I am using my own API keys
- [ ] I understand this is self-hosted (not a shared service)

**Vercel URL:** https://my-instance.vercel.app

**Bug Description:**
[Describe the bug]
```

---

## FAQ Section for README

Add this to address common confusion:

### â“ Common Questions

**Q: Is there a website I can visit?**
A: No! You must deploy your own instance first. Click the "Deploy to Vercel" button above.

**Q: Do you host this for me?**
A: No, each user deploys their own private instance. It's free and takes 2 minutes.

**Q: Who pays for the AI?**
A: You do (directly to Anthropic). You bring your own API key. ~$0.03 per debate.

**Q: Can I use this without deploying?**
A: No, there's no shared instance. This is self-hosted software.

**Q: Is it really free?**
A: Hosting is free (Vercel). You pay only for AI API usage (~$0.03/debate).

**Q: Do I need to know how to code?**
A: No! Just click the deploy button and follow the 4 steps above.

---

**Apply these settings and your GitHub repo will be unmistakably clear about the deployment model!** ğŸ¯
